verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> He Shewed <S%G1166><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> A River <S%G4215><s%> Of Water <S%G5204><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> Bright <S%G2986><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Crystal, <S%G2930><s%> Going Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> The Midst <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4113><s%> Of Its Street <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> River, <S%G4215><s%> On This Side <S%G1782><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On That Side, The <S%G1782><s%> Tree <S%G3586><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> Producing <S%G4160><s%> Fruits <S%G2590><s%> <S%G1427><s%> Twelve, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3376><s%> Month <S%G1520><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Yielding <S%G591><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Its; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaves <S%G5444><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G3586><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Healing <S%G2322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Curse <S%G2652><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Longer; <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Shall Be; <S%G2071><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen <S%G846><s%> Shall Serve <S%G3000><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall See <S%G3700><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> His Face; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> Their Foreheads Is. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%>, There, <S%G1563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Of A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Light <S%G5457><s%> Of The Sun, <S%G2246><s%> Because The <S%G3754><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Enlightens <S%G5461><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall Reign <S%G936><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Words Are <S%G3056><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True; <S%G228><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> His <S%G846><s%> To Shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen <S%G846><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G1096><s%> Come To Pass <S%G1722><s%> Soon. <S%G5034><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> . Quickly. <S%G5035><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Is He Who <S%G3588><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G975><s%> Of This Book. <S%G5127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I 1473 P-1NS John Was 2491 N-NSM He Who Was 3588 T-NSM Seeing 991 V-PAP-NSM These Things 5023 D-APN And 2532 CONJ Hearing. 191 V-PAP-NSM And 2532 CONJ When 3753 ADV I Heard 191 V-AAI-1S And 2532 CONJ Saw 991 V-AAI-1S I Fell Down 4098 V-2AAI-1S To Do Homage 4352 V-AAN Before 1715 PREP The 3588 T-GPM Feet 4228 N-GPM Of The 3588 T-GSM Angel 32 N-GSM Who Was 3588 T-GSM Shewing 1166 V-PAP-GSM Me 3427 P-1DS These Things. 5023 D-APN

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> See Thou Do It <S%G3708><s%> Not : <S%G3361><s%> Fellow Bondman <S%G4889><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I Am, <S%G1510><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Of Thy Brethren <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G975><s%> Of This Book : <S%G5127><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> Do Homage. <S%G4352><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Seal Not <S%G4972><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> Of This; <S%G5127><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Is Unrighteous <S%G91><s%> Let Him Be Unrighteous <S%G91><s%> Still; <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Is Filthy <S%G4510><s%> Let Him Be Filthy <S%G4510><s%> Still; <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That Is <S%G3588><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Let Him Be Righteous <S%G1344><s%> Still; <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That Is <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Let Him Be Sanctified <S%G37><s%> Still. <S%G2089><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> Quickly, <S%G5035><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> To Render <S%G591><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Shall Be. <S%G2071><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSN Alpha 1 N-LI And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSN Omega, 5598 N-LI The Beginning 746 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ End, 5056 N-NSN The 3588 T-NSM First 4413 A-NSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Last. 2078 A-NSM

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Are They That <S%G3588><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%>, His Commandments <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> Their Authority <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G3586><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Gates <S%G4440><s%> They Should Go In <S%G1525><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%>

<S%G1854><s%> But Without Are <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dogs, <S%G2965><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sorcerers, <S%G5333><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Murderers, <S%G5406><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G5368><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> A Lie. <S%G5579><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Jesus 2424 N-NSM Sent 3992 V-AAI-1S 3588 T-ASM 32 N-ASM Mine Angel 3450 P-1GS To Testify 3140 V-AAN To You 5213 P-2DP These Things 5023 D-APN In 1909 PREP The 3588 T-DPF Assemblies. 1577 N-DPF I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSF Root 4491 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSN Offspring 1085 N-NSN 3588 T-GSM, Of David, 1138 N-PRI The 3588 T-NSM Star 792 N-NSM 3588 T-NSM Bright 2986 A-NSM And 2532 CONJ Morning. 3720 A-NSM

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bride <S%G3565><s%>, Say, <S%G3004><s%>, Come. <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Hears <S%G191><s%>, Let Him Say, <S%G2036><s%>, Come. <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Thirsts <S%G1372><s%> Let Him Come; <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Wills, <S%G2309><s%> Let Him Take <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Gratuitously. <S%G1432><s%>

<S%G4828><s%> For I Jointly Testify <S%G1063><s%> To Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G975><s%>, Of This Book, <S%G5127><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Add <S%G2007><s%> To <S%G4314><s%>, These Things, <S%G5023><s%> Shall Add <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> ' Unto <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Plagues <S%G4127><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Are Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G975><s%> This Book. <S%G5129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Take <S%G851><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The Book <S%G976><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4394><s%> Of This Prophecy, <S%G3778><s%> Shall Take Sway <S%G851><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3313><s%> His Part <S%G846><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life, <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> This. <S%G5129><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Testifies <S%G3140><s%>, These Things, <S%G5023><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> . Quickly. <S%G5035><s%>, Amen; <S%G281><s%>, Yea, <S%G3483><s%>, Come, <S%G2064><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> . You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
